thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com
thread.title: Doug Lipski
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Doug Lipski

author: Doug Lipski
title: Doug Lipski
text:
I do not write reviews for just about anyone, unless they have been a real standout, good or bad. This is, I am pleased to say a very good review. Super customer service/orientation.
I spoke with Mike about issues I was having with finding binoculars due to wearing glasses and eye relief. Mike spent a long time on the phone with me discussing the issue. Mike took the time to measure the usable eye relief vs the listed.
Very helpful even after it became apparent I was likely not going to be able to find what I was looking for. My problem not theirs.
They know there stuff and better yet treated me in a very professional kind manner. All questions were answered even after it became apparent we were not going to be able to get together to purchase.
